home.title: Welcome to the Paramedical Institute
home.subtitle: Excellence in paramedical training
home.aboutDescription: The Paramedical Institute of Sidi Bel Abbès is a higher education institution dedicated to training competent professionals in the field of public health. We offer quality training programs that prepare our students to excel in their paramedical careers.
home.mission: Our mission is to provide excellence-based training based on professional skills and ethical values, while preparing our students to meet the growing needs of the health sector.
home.whyChooseUsSubtitle: We are committed to offering the best possible educational experience

modernInfrastructure.title: Modern Infrastructure
modernInfrastructure.description: Laboratories equipped with the latest technologies and medical equipment

practicalExperience.title: Practical Experience
practicalExperience.description: Clinical internships and practices in partner health facilities

about.title: About the Institute
about.subtitle: Paramedical Institute of Sidi Bel Abbès - Excellence in paramedical training

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Train competent and committed paramedical professionals to meet public health needs. The institute is committed to providing quality training based on professional skills and ethical values, to prepare students to practice their profession with excellence in the field of public health.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be a reference institute in paramedical training, recognized for the excellence of its programs, the quality of its teaching and the impact of its graduates on the Algerian public health system. We aspire to train a new generation of paramedical professionals capable of evolving in a constantly changing health environment.

history.title: History
history.p1: The Paramedical Institute of Sidi Bel Abbès is part of the national network of paramedical training institutes under the supervision of the National Pedagogical Institute of Paramedical Training (INPFP).
history.p2: The institute offers Professional License level training in various paramedical fields, in accordance with national public health training standards. Our programs are designed to meet the real needs of the health sector and prepare students for contemporary professional challenges.
history.p3: Since its creation, the institute has trained hundreds of paramedical professionals who actively contribute to the Algerian health system, in public health facilities across the country.

programs.title: Our Training
programs.description: The institute offers Professional License level training (3 years) in the following fields:

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in all aspects of training and teaching.

ethics.title: Ethics
ethics.description: Integrity and professional ethics are at the heart of our training.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We adopt modern and innovative teaching methods.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We are here to answer your questions
